# Draft:Renaissance Africa Energy Company

Renaissance Africa Energy Company Limited. also commonly called, RAEC or simply just Renaissance is as a Nigerian oil-and-gas consortium, uniting five energy companies (four Nigerian and one international), namely: ND Western Limited, Aradel Holdings Plc, FIRST Exploration and Petroleum Development Company Limited, and the Waltersmith Group).
It was incorporated in 2011 and is a fully integrated oil and gas company operating in Nigeria. The company is currently chaired by its Managing Director (MD), Tony Attah, who has also served as the Director of other major oil and gas exploration companies in Nigeria such as SNEPCo and Nigeria LNG

2025 Acquisition of SPDC
On March 13, 2025, Shell completed the sale of its Nigerian Subsidiary: The Shell Petroleum Development Company of Nigeria Limited (SPDC) to Renaissance Africa Energy Company Limited (RAEC) for a total potential transaction value of approximately $2.4 billion.
